entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.5°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
